interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: The Young in Heart
Review Date: 2018/09/02
Store: Janet Gaynor  (Actor),     Douglas Fairbanks Jr.  (Actor),     Richard Wallace  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    NR    Format: Blu-ray
Categories: Movies & TV, Blu-ray, Movies
Product Description: ["Having been given the bum's rush at Monte Carlo, a clan of polished grifters (Janet Gaynor, Douglas Fairbanks, Jr., Roland Young, Billie Burke) make the fortuitous acquaintance of a wealthy and lonely old widow (Minnie Dupree) during a cross-continent train trip. Their plans to insinuate themselves in her life and sponge off of her wind up crashing on shoals of unaccustomed conscience, in this winning and warm comedy. Paulette Goddard, Richard Carlson, Henry Stephenson also star. 90 min. Standard; Soundtrack: English Dolby Digital mono; Subtitles: English; theatrical trailer."]
Average Rating: 4.5
Product Details: {'Genre': 'Comedy', 'Format': 'Anamorphic, NTSC, Subtitled', 'Contributor': 'Roland Young, Douglas Fairbanks Jr., Billie Burke, Richard Carlson, Paulette Goddard, Janet Gaynor, Richard WallaceRoland Young, Douglas Fairbanks Jr., Billie Burke, Richard Carlson, Paulette Goddard, Janet Gaynor, Richard Wallace  See more', 'Language': 'English', 'Runtime': '1 hour and 30 minutes', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'NR (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 2.72 Ounces', 'Director': 'Richard Wallace', 'Media Format': 'Anamorphic, NTSC, Subtitled', 'Run time': '1 hour and 30 minutes', 'Release date': 'January 9, 2018', 'Actors': 'Janet Gaynor, Douglas Fairbanks Jr., Paulette Goddard, Roland Young, Billie Burke', 'Subtitles': 'English', 'Studio': 'Kl Studio Classics', 'Number of discs': '1'}
Review Text: A precious old movie! Love the transformation that occurs in the con artist family. Optimistic story with positive, uplifting outcome.
Review Title: Precious story, great stars!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

The user exhibits a strong affinity for classic cinema, particularly comedies that highlight character development and transformative narratives. They appreciate films featuring renowned actors, suggesting a preference for star power and cinematic history. Their review indicates a genuine enjoyment of uplifting stories with positive resolutions, pointing to a tendency toward feel-good entertainment. The user values quality in filmmaking, as reflected by their high average rating of 4.5 out of 5 for previous purchases, indicating a critical but appreciative viewing style. Additionally, their engagement with Blu-ray formats suggests a preference for high-quality visual and audio experiences. Overall, the user’s preferences lean heavily towards lighthearted, nostalgic films that balance humor with heartfelt themes.
